message: Let's get this started! Take the smaller share, I'll take the lion's share.
You're not getting all the money that easily! I'm taking a fair share.
That's still too little for me. I'll make a counteroffer.
Meet me in the middle! Take 40% of the original amount, I'll take 60%.
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still getting a good deal.
I'm not settling for that. I'll make a new offer.
I'm willing to give up a bit more to get a better deal. Take 45% of the original amount, I'll take 55%.
